    class Jekyll::Converters::CoffeeScript

    Public Instance Methods

    convert(content) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/jekyll/converters/coffeescript.rb, line 22
def convert(content)
  setup unless @setup
  ::CoffeeScript.compile(content)
end
    matches(ext) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/jekyll/converters/coffeescript.rb, line 14
def matches(ext)
  ext.casecmp(".coffee").zero?
end
    output_ext(_ext) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/jekyll/converters/coffeescript.rb, line 18
def output_ext(_ext)
  ".js"
end
    setup() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/jekyll/converters/coffeescript.rb, line 9
def setup
  require "coffee-script"
  @setup = true
end
